ED_Title: Rights of reply to addresses  by Heads of State
ED_DecisionText: At its 3rd plenary meeting, on 16 September 2022, the General Assembly took note of the information provided in paragraph 50 of the report of the General Committee  (footnote: A/77/250) concerning rights of reply to addresses by Heads of State.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/77/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
